item.title: Idiot Bishop--and he ain't American
item.description: Catholic Bishop Tiny Muskens (make your own joke) says all Christians should refer to God only as “Allah.” The Dutch bishop believes that surrendering to the Muslims is in the best interest of Christianity. Thanks, but no thanks, Your Excellency. Instead of that, how about if we call you “de-frocked” Bishop? According to CWN: The Dutch bishop admitted that his suggestion was not likely to gain widespread acceptance. But he predicted that within a century or two, Dutch Catholics would be addressing prayers to “Allah.
